languages.text: Each stack of burst of disease increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by +7.
languages.original_text: Каждый уровень эффекта "вспышка болезни" увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} на 7.

traits.locale_text: Each stack of Burst of Disease increases Strength, Toughness, and Agility by +7.
